attributes.additional_details:
You are more likely to overdose on alcohol and tobacco cigarettes. Then you are to overdose on marijuana marijuana. Also bringing an extra £16 billion a year to the UK economy through taxes alone.
We think it’s time that the UK follow 
America’s example and legalise cannabis
attributes.background: Cannabis has been legalised in some states in America. We feel like it’s time for it to be legalised here we want the government to legalise the sale production and use of cannabis for recreational and medicinal use.
